scripts.start: npm run clean && npm run build && node dist/Runner.js
scripts.test: npm run dev && node dist/TestRunner.js test
scripts.rt: npm run build && node dist/Runner.js dev src/test/reactjs/src src/test/reactjs/src/reactbootdev
scripts.rtbuild: npm run rt && cd src/test/reactjs && npm run build
scripts.rttest: npm run rt && cd src/test/reactjs && npm run test
scripts.pub: npm run clean && npm run build && npm publish
